Title: BlueX Payments
Content: Grow your business and pay vendors in over 30 currencies with competitive FX rates.
Comment:
BlueX Pay Global Accounts enable the collection of payments. Through your Global Account number, you can collect funds via domestic payment methods and/or SWIFT.

Global Accounts can be opened in two different jurisdictions – the United States and Hong Kong. Depending on where you expect to receive payments, you can open a Global Account in that jurisdiction, so that you can save on costs and receive funds on a local level. Receive money quickly. Most local payments settle on the same day.

Title: BlueX Pay-it-Later
Content: Net 30/60 day pay-later options for your freight and cargo. Vendors get paid instantly, while you can pay it later.
